dl_forward module¶

dl_forward.forward_sigmoid(x, w, b)¶

Forward propagate x, the input to this layer, with w and b, the weights in this layer, to obtain z. Activate z with the sigmoid function to produce a.

a = sigmoid (wx + b)

Args:
x (matrix): A (n[0] x m) matrix, where n[0] is the number of nodes in the previous layer, and m is the number of examples. w (matrix): A (n[1] x n[0]) matrix of weights in this layer, where n[1] is the number of nodes in this layer, b (matrix): A (n[1] x 1) matrix of constants in this layer, where n[1] is the number of nodes in this layer,
Returns:
matrix: A (n[1] x m) matrix where (every n[1] x 1) column is the activated forward propagation output for an example.
